name: Plaught Armor
description:
Created for the GMTK 2020 Game Jame with the theme "Out of Control". Inspired by the combat in Megaman Battle Network, where you can't control your character's movement. The game was made using Godot and the art was made using Aseprite. Source Code Included.

Melee Attack = Z

Short Range Attack = X

Long Range Attack = C

Shield = V

I blame ThunderYak for the name.
